0: Bed was comfy sheets were soft view was awesome but we wished room service was open after 9 pm
The bellman Steve was truly exceptional friendly helpful pleasant seeking to anticipate our needs and questions
Overall very secure hotel and there is a lot of staff
Thank you to the hotel staff for a memorable stay
Wonderful staff that goes over the top
Shuttle service and valet are an added plus
This facility has been reliable with amazing views and service
1: Maid service showed up at 4 pm while we were getting ready for the wedding and when we said we had be done with the room at 530 they said that was too late
Outdated furniture passive aggressive front desk employees location is far from everything
I returned to the desk and explained but still could not reach the housekeeping
Just say that up front and do not promise service you can not provide
in was rude and she got our room number wrong causing us to have to go back to the desk
